short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Really ignores ignored users, and ignore users in specific topics

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hides the following in topics on rllmukforum.com:

- "You've chosen to ignore content byâ€¦" placeholders for posts by ignored users
- Posts which quote an ignored user
- Posts which @-mention an ignored user
- Topics created by ignored users

After installing, visit your Ignored Users page and the extension will synchronise itself with your global ignored users settings.

When browsing a topic, hover over a user's name to view their profile card - click the new "Ignore In This Topic" button this extension adds to ignore them in the current topic only.

The extension also adds a new section to the Ignored Users page to manage users ignored in specific topics.

Please remind your fellow forumites to quote or @-mention ignore-worthy users when engaging with them.
